creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by Mr and Mrs James McClatchy
description: small accordion album with landscapes, text and an image of flowers; very heavily worn green fabric cover
inscription:
Inscriptions, Marks, and Seals

various, inside
markings: front cover, URC, brown ink: [Hirano Gogaku]; front cover, ULC, in red: [164]; R side of book on pages, in brown: [Gogaku]; top of book on pages, in black: [Hirano Gogaku]; inside front cover, in pencil: [Hirano Gogaku / 1809-1893] / Dated 1873]; URC inner cover, in red: [164]; various seals inside
medium: Ink and light colors on paper
title: Miniature Album
